ygData.subject: Re: Any info on these?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I personally know of a L50 Human cleric on Innoruuk (Grifter) who owns such a mask. When I did a who and saw him in the list described as a Dark Elf, I
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Diablo" <diablo99@...>

> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > 3. The deceiver mask (cant remember exact name, turn u to >
> DE). Dropped by
> > lower guk assasin. Anyone got map to the spot? Also how tough is the
> > assasin?

> about 35 and he can backstab for 80 X 2 and drops guise of the deceiver (brd
> rog wearable +12 cha (?) +7 sv magic ac4) as common and serrated bone dirk,

I personally know of a L50 Human cleric on Innoruuk (Grifter) who
owns such a mask. When I did a who and saw him in the list
described as a Dark Elf, I asked him what was up.

He told me he had a mask that would cast Illusion: Dark Elf when
activated. (The mechanism is the same as the fabled Journeyman
boots.) He may not have been wearing it, but he definitely could
use it.


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor

Praetor@...
